rules.rule: Python project with type hints. Trust type checkers. Only flag logic errors, not type annotations.
Canvas API handlers must catch errors and handle rate limiting. Flag unhandled exceptions and missing input validation.
Sync logic for Canvas LMS to Obsidian. Flag file operations without existence checks, missing error handling for HTTP requests.
Flask web routes. Flag missing input validation and error responses that leak internal details.

other.content: Solo developer project using 'Silent Sentinel' review philosophy. Prioritize: (1) Security vulnerabilities, (2) Runtime crashes, (3) Data corruption, (4) Performance bottlenecks. IGNORE: Style, formatting, naming, minor refactoring suggestions. Read Macroscope.md for detailed rules.
